title: Ramadan 2026: UAE announces Zakat Al Fitr, Fidyah, Kaffarah rates
summary_full: UAE Islamic Affairs Council has set official rates for Ramadan 2026 charitable contributions. Zakat Al Fitr is fixed at Dh25 per person, while Fidyah for missed fasts is Dh20 daily. Kaffarah for broken vows or invalidated fasts ranges from Dh200 to Dh1,200. These figures, based on market studies, ensure transparency and fairness in charitable giving across the Emirates.
